DEFAULT_GENERAL_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, the server encountered an error. We are trying to fix that.
DEFAULT_SERVER_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, the server encountered an error. We are trying to fix that.
DEFAULT_BAD_REQUEST_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, the request can not be processed. Please, try again.
DEFAULT_NOT_FOUND_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, the resource is not found.
DEFAULT_CONFLICT_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, the action produce conflict in our records. Pleas, try again.
